Module com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord
Package com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodefactory

Class NodeFactory

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodefactory.NodeFactory
public class NodeFactory extends Object
A factory that can be used to create Nodes. It does not manage the objects it creates.

      public Supplier<Node> getSupplierFor(String identifier)
      find the sub-factory that matches the given identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the name of type of Node the sub-factory produces.
      Returns:
      the sub-factory that matches the given identifier, or null if not found.

      public Node create(String identifier)
      Create a new Node of the given type.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the type of Node to create.
      Returns:
      a new instance of the Node, or null if the supplier is not found.
